statements: SELECT * FROM InfluencerContent WHERE id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, content FROM InfluencerContent WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalContent FROM InfluencerContent;
SELECT influencer_name, content, creation_date FROM InfluencerContent ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT MIN(creation_date) AS FirstContentDate FROM InfluencerContent;
SELECT id, influencer_name, content, creation_date FROM InfluencerContent WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT influencer_name, id, content, creation_date FROM InfluencerContent WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerContent WHERE influencer_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY content ASC;
SELECT id, influencer_name, creation_date, content FROM InfluencerContent WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT content, influencer_name, id, creation_date FROM InfluencerContent WHERE creation_date < '2022-03-15' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM influencer_content WHERE id = 1
SELECT influencer_id, content_type FROM influencer_content WHERE content_type = 'image'
SELECT * FROM influencer_content ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT content_description, post_date FROM influencer_content WHERE influencer_id = 5
SELECT id, influencer_id, content_type FROM influencer_content
SELECT * FROM influencer_content WHERE influencer_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT content_description, post_date FROM influencer_content WHERE content_type = 'Video' LIMIT 10;
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(id) AS total_posts FROM influencer_content GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_posts > 5;
SELECT brand_id, strategy_type, strategy_description FROM brand_marketing_strategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT influencer_id, content_type, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM influencer_content GROUP BY influencer_id, content_type HAVING total_content > 2 ORDER BY influencer_id, total_content DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, email FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_id > 2;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM Content ORDER BY posted_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, brand_name, content_url FROM Influencers JOIN Content ON Influencers.influencer_id = Content.influencer_id JOIN Brands ON Content.brand_id = Brands.brand_id;
SELECT influencer_name, email FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE brand_id = 2;
SELECT influencer_name, email, brand_name, industry FROM Influencers JOIN Brands ON influencer_id = 3 AND brand_id = 3;
SELECT influencer_name, brand_name, content_type, content_url, posted_date FROM Influencers JOIN Content ON influencer_id = 4;
SELECT influencer_name, brand_name, content_type, content_url, posted_date FROM Influencers JOIN Content ON influencer_id = 5 AND brand_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM influencer_content ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT id, content FROM influencer_content WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands WHERE website IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM repurposed_content ORDER BY repurpose_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_content WHERE influencer_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111';
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT original_content_id, repurposed_content, repurpose_date FROM repurposed_content WHERE original_content_id = '22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM influencer_content;
SELECT * FROM Influencer;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_followers FROM Influencer ORDER BY influencer_followers DESC;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brand WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT content_text, post_date FROM Content WHERE brand_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Influencer ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brand WHERE industry='Fashion';
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_followers FROM Influencer WHERE influencer_followers > 100000 ORDER BY influencer_followers DESC;
SELECT content_text, post_date FROM Content WHERE influencer_id = 1 AND brand_id = 2;
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM Brand JOIN Content ON Brand.brand_id = Content.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name ORDER BY total_content DESC;
